text: Patrick Galen Dempsey (born January 13, 1966 lists his birthday as January 13, lists it as January 10.) is an American actor. He is best known for his work on the television series Grey's Anatomy as Doctor Derek Shepherd. He has won a Screen Actors Guild Award as a cast member of Grey's Anatomy. He has also been nominated for the Emmy and Golden Globe Awards. He has been in the many movies. These include Transformers: Dark of the Moon, Valentine's Day, Sweet Home Alabama, Brother Bear 2 and Enchanted. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Maine Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:People from Malibu, California Category:People from Lewiston, Maine
title: Patrick Dempsey
